.. _class_Color:

Color
=====

æè¿°
----

ç”±çº¢ï¼ˆ\ :ref:`r<class_Color_property_r>`\ ï¼‰ã€ç»¿ï¼ˆ\ :ref:`g<class_Color_property_g>`\ ï¼‰ã€è“ï¼ˆ\ :ref:`b<class_Color_property_b>`\ ï¼‰å’Œ alphaï¼ˆ\ :ref:`a<class_Color_property_a>`\ ï¼‰åˆ†é‡è¡¨ç¤ºçš„ RGBA æ ¼å¼çš„é¢œè‰²ã€‚æ¯ä¸ªåˆ†é‡éƒ½æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ª 32 ä½æµ®ç‚¹å€¼ï¼Œé€šå¸¸ä»‹äº ``0.0`` åˆ° ``1.0`` ä¹‹é—´ã€‚æŸäº›å±æ€§ï¼ˆä¾‹å¦‚ :ref:`CanvasItem.modulate<class_CanvasItem_property_modulate>`\ ï¼‰å¯èƒ½æ”¯æŒå¤§äº ``1.0`` çš„å€¼ï¼Œç”¨äºè¡¨ç¤ºè¿‡äº®æˆ– HDRï¼ˆHigh Dynamic Rangeï¼Œé«˜åŠ¨æ€èŒƒå›´ï¼‰é¢œè‰²ã€‚

åˆ›å»ºé¢œè‰²çš„æ–¹æ³•æœ‰å¾ˆå¤šï¼šå¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨ **Color** çš„å„ç§æ„é€ å‡½æ•°ï¼Œ\ :ref:`from_hsv<class_Color_method_from_hsv>` ç­‰é™æ€æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œä»¥åŠä½¿ç”¨åŸºäº `X11 é¢œè‰²åç§° <https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/X11_color_names>`__\ çš„æ ‡å‡†åŒ–é¢œè‰²é›†å¤–åŠ  :ref:`TRANSPARENT<class_Color_constant_TRANSPARENT>`\ ã€‚GDScript è¿˜æä¾›äº† :ref:`@GDScript.Color8<class_@GDScript_method_Color8>`\ ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨çš„æ˜¯ ``0`` åˆ° ``255`` ä¹‹é—´çš„æ•´æ•°ï¼Œä¸”ä¸æ”¯æŒè¿‡äº®çš„é¢œè‰²ã€‚

\ **æ³¨æ„ï¼š**\ åœ¨å¸ƒå°”ä¸Šä¸‹æ–‡ä¸­ï¼Œç­‰äº ``Color(0, 0, 0, 1)``\ ï¼ˆä¸é€æ˜çš„é»‘è‰²ï¼‰çš„ Color å°†è¢«è¯„ä¼°ä¸º ``false``\ ã€‚å¦åˆ™ï¼ŒColor å°†å§‹ç»ˆè¢«è¯„ä¼°ä¸º ``true``\ ã€‚

.. _class_Color_constructor_Color:

ç”¨ä¸é€æ˜çš„é»‘è‰²æ„é€ é»˜è®¤çš„ **Color**\ ï¼Œä¸ :ref:`BLACK<class_Color_constant_BLACK>` ç›¸åŒã€‚

\ **æ³¨æ„ï¼š**\ åœ¨ C# ä¸­æ„é€ çš„ç©ºé¢œè‰²ï¼Œå…¶æ‰€æœ‰åˆ†é‡éƒ½ä¸º ``0.0``\ ï¼ˆé€æ˜é»‘ï¼‰ã€‚

.. rst-class:: classref-constructor

:ref:`Color<class_Color>` **Color**\ (\ from\: :ref:`Color<class_Color>`, alpha\: :ref:`float<class_float>`\ )

ä»ç°æœ‰çš„é¢œè‰²æ„é€  **Color**\ ï¼Œ\ :ref:`a<class_Color_property_a>` è®¾ç½®ä¸ºç»™å®šçš„ ``alpha`` å€¼ã€‚


.. tabs::

 .. code-tab:: gdscript

    var red = Color(Color.RED, 0.2) # 20% ä¸é€æ˜çº¢è‰²ã€‚

 .. code-tab:: csharp

    var red = new Color(Colors.Red, 0.2f); // 20% ä¸é€æ˜çº¢è‰²ã€‚

ä»é€šå¸¸ä»‹äº 0.0 å’Œ 1.0 ä¹‹é—´çš„ RGB å€¼æ„é€ ä¸€ä¸ª **Color**\ ã€‚\ :ref:`a<class_Color_property_a>` è¢«è®¾ç½®ä¸º 1.0ã€‚

ä»é€šå¸¸ä»‹äº 0.0 å’Œ 1.0 ä¹‹é—´çš„ RGBA å€¼æ„é€ ä¸€ä¸ª **Color**\ ã€‚

.. _class_Color_method_blend:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

:ref:`Color<class_Color>` **blend**\ (\ over\: :ref:`Color<class_Color>`\ ) |const| :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_Color_method_blend>`

è¿”å›å°†è¯¥é¢œè‰²æ··åˆåˆ°ç»™å®šé¢œè‰²ä¸Šæ‰€äº§ç”Ÿçš„æ–°é¢œè‰²ã€‚åœ¨ç»˜ç”»ç¨‹åºä¸­ï¼Œä½ å¯ä»¥å°†å…¶æƒ³è±¡ä¸ºåœ¨è¯¥é¢œè‰²ï¼ˆåŒ…æ‹¬ alphaï¼‰ä¸Šç»˜åˆ¶çš„ ``over`` é¢œè‰²ã€‚


.. tabs::

 .. code-tab:: gdscript

    var bg = Color(0.0, 1.0, 0.0, 0.5) # 50% ä¸é€æ˜çš„ç»¿è‰²
    var fg = Color(1.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.5) # 50% ä¸é€æ˜çš„çº¢è‰²
    var blended_color = bg.blend(fg) # 75% ä¸é€æ˜çš„æ£•è‰²

 .. code-tab:: csharp

    var bg = new Color(0.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f, 0.5f); // 50% ä¸é€æ˜çš„ç»¿è‰²
    var fg = new Color(1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f, 0.5f); // 50% ä¸é€æ˜çš„çº¢è‰²
    Color blendedColor = bg.Blend(fg); // 75% ä¸é€æ˜çš„æ£•è‰²



.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

.. _class_Color_method_clamp:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

:ref:`Color<class_Color>` **clamp**\ (\ min\: :ref:`Color<class_Color>` = Color(0, 0, 0, 0), max\: :ref:`Color<class_Color>` = Color(1, 1, 1, 1)\ ) |const| :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_Color_method_clamp>`

é€šè¿‡åœ¨æ¯ä¸ªåˆ†é‡ä¸Šè¿è¡Œ :ref:`@GlobalScope.clamp<class_@GlobalScope_method_clamp>`\ ï¼Œè¿”å›ä¸€ç§æ–°é¢œè‰²ï¼Œå…¶ä¸­æ‰€æœ‰åˆ†é‡éƒ½è¢«é’³åˆ¶åœ¨ ``min`` å’Œ ``max`` çš„åˆ†é‡ä¹‹é—´ã€‚

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

.. _class_Color_method_darkened:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

:ref:`Color<class_Color>` **darkened**\ (\ amount\: :ref:`float<class_float>`\ ) |const| :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_Color_method_darkened>`

è¿”å›é€šè¿‡æŒ‡å®š ``amount``\ ï¼ˆä» 0.0 åˆ° 1.0 çš„æ¯”ç‡ï¼‰ä½¿è¯¥é¢œè‰²å˜æš—è€Œäº§ç”Ÿçš„æ–°é¢œè‰²ã€‚å¦è§ :ref:`lightened<class_Color_method_lightened>`\ ã€‚


.. tabs::

 .. code-tab:: gdscript

    var green = Color(0.0, 1.0, 0.0)
    var darkgreen = green.darkened(0.2) # æ¯”æ™®é€šçš„ç»¿è‰²æ·± 20%

 .. code-tab:: csharp

    var green = new Color(0.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f);
    Color darkgreen = green.Darkened(0.2f); // æ¯”æ™®é€šçš„ç»¿è‰²æ·± 20%



.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

.. _class_Color_method_from_hsv:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

:ref:`Color<class_Color>` **from_hsv**\ (\ h\: :ref:`float<class_float>`, s\: :ref:`float<class_float>`, v\: :ref:`float<class_float>`, alpha\: :ref:`float<class_float>` = 1.0\ ) |static| :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_Color_method_from_hsv>`

æ ¹æ® `HSV é…ç½® <https://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/HSL%E5%92%8CHSV%E8%89%B2%E5%BD%A9%E7%A9%BA%E9%97%B4>`__\ æ„å»ºé¢œè‰²ã€‚è‰²ç›¸ï¼ˆ\ ``h``\ ï¼‰ã€é¥±å’Œåº¦ï¼ˆ\ ``s``\ ï¼‰å’Œå€¼ï¼ˆ\ ``v``\ ï¼‰é€šå¸¸åœ¨ 0.0 å’Œ 1.0 ä¹‹é—´ã€‚


.. tabs::

 .. code-tab:: gdscript

    var color = Color.from_hsv(0.58, 0.5, 0.79, 0.8)

 .. code-tab:: csharp

    var color = Color.FromHsv(0.58f, 0.5f, 0.79f, 0.8f);



.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

----

.. _class_Color_method_from_ok_hsl:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

:ref:`Color<class_Color>` **from_ok_hsl**\ (\ h\: :ref:`float<class_float>`, s\: :ref:`float<class_float>`, l\: :ref:`float<class_float>`, alpha\: :ref:`float<class_float>` = 1.0\ ) |static| :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_Color_method_from_ok_hsl>`

æ ¹æ® `OK HSL é…ç½® <https://bottosson.github.io/posts/colorpicker/>`__\ æ„å»ºé¢œè‰²ã€‚è‰²ç›¸ï¼ˆ\ ``h``\ ï¼‰ã€é¥±å’Œåº¦ï¼ˆ\ ``s``\ ï¼‰å’Œäº®åº¦ï¼ˆ\ ``l``\ ï¼‰é€šå¸¸åœ¨ 0.0 å’Œ 1.0 ä¹‹é—´ã€‚


.. tabs::

 .. code-tab:: gdscript

    var color = Color.from_ok_hsl(0.58, 0.5, 0.79, 0.8)

 .. code-tab:: csharp

    var color = Color.FromOkHsl(0.58f, 0.5f, 0.79f, 0.8f);



.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

----

.. _class_Color_method_from_rgbe9995:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

:ref:`Color<class_Color>` **from_rgbe9995**\ (\ rgbe\: :ref:`int<class_int>`\ ) |static| :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_Color_method_from_rgbe9995>`

ä» RGBE9995 æ ¼å¼çš„æ•´æ•°è§£ç  **Color**\ ã€‚è§ :ref:`Image.FORMAT_RGBE9995<class_Image_constant_FORMAT_RGBE9995>`\ ã€‚

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

----

.. _class_Color_method_from_string:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

:ref:`Color<class_Color>` **from_string**\ (\ str\: :ref:`String<class_String>`, default\: :ref:`Color<class_Color>`\ ) |static| :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_Color_method_from_string>`

ä»ç»™å®šçš„å­—ç¬¦ä¸²åˆ›å»º **Color**\ ï¼Œè¯¥å­—ç¬¦ä¸²å¯ä»¥æ˜¯ HTML é¢œè‰²ä»£ç ï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥æ˜¯é¢œè‰²åç§°ï¼ˆä¸åŒºåˆ†å¤§å°å†™ï¼‰ã€‚å¦‚æœæ— æ³•ä»å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ä¸­æ¨æ–­å‡ºé¢œè‰²ï¼Œåˆ™è¿”å› ``default``\ ã€‚

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

----

.. _class_Color_method_get_luminance:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

:ref:`float<class_float>` **get_luminance**\ (\ ) |const| :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_Color_method_get_luminance>`

å°†é¢œè‰²çš„å…‰ç…§å¼ºåº¦è¿”å›ä¸ºä¸€ä¸ªä»‹äº 0.0 å’Œ 1.0ï¼ˆåŒ…å«ï¼‰ä¹‹é—´çš„å€¼ã€‚è¿™åœ¨ç¡®å®šæµ…è‰²æˆ–æ·±è‰²æ—¶å¾ˆæœ‰ç”¨ã€‚äº®åº¦å°äº 0.5 çš„é¢œè‰²é€šå¸¸å¯ä»¥è®¤ä¸ºæ˜¯æ·±è‰²ã€‚

\ **æ³¨æ„ï¼š**\ :ref:`get_luminance<class_Color_method_get_luminance>` ä¾èµ–äºçº¿æ€§è‰²å½©ç©ºé—´ä¸­çš„é¢œè‰²ï¼Œä»¥è¿”å›å‡†ç¡®çš„ç›¸å¯¹äº®åº¦å€¼ã€‚å¦‚æœé¢œè‰²åœ¨ sRGB è‰²å½©ç©ºé—´ï¼Œè¯·å…ˆä½¿ç”¨ :ref:`srgb_to_linear<class_Color_method_srgb_to_linear>` å°†å…¶è½¬æ¢ä¸ºçº¿æ€§è‰²å½©ç©ºé—´ã€‚

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

----

.. _class_Color_method_hex:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

:ref:`Color<class_Color>` **hex**\ (\ hex\: :ref:`int<class_int>`\ ) |static| :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_Color_method_hex>`

Returns the **Color** associated with the provided ``hex`` integer in 32-bit RGBA format (8 bits per channel). This method is the inverse of :ref:`to_rgba32<class_Color_method_to_rgba32>`.

In GDScript and C#, the :ref:`int<class_int>` is best visualized with hexadecimal notation (``"0x"`` prefix, making it ``"0xRRGGBBAA"``).


.. tabs::

 .. code-tab:: gdscript

    var red = Color.hex(0xff0000ff)
    var dark_cyan = Color.hex(0x008b8bff)
    var my_color = Color.hex(0xbbefd2a4)

 .. code-tab:: csharp

    var red = new Color(0xff0000ff);
    var dark_cyan = new Color(0x008b8bff);
    var my_color = new Color(0xbbefd2a4);



.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

----

.. _class_Color_method_hex64:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

:ref:`Color<class_Color>` **hex64**\ (\ hex\: :ref:`int<class_int>`\ ) |static| :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_Color_method_hex64>`

Returns the **Color** associated with the provided ``hex`` integer in 64-bit RGBA format (16 bits per channel). This method is the inverse of :ref:`to_rgba64<class_Color_method_to_rgba64>`.

In GDScript and C#, the :ref:`int<class_int>` is best visualized with hexadecimal notation (``"0x"`` prefix, making it ``"0xRRRRGGGGBBBBAAAA"``).

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

----

.. _class_Color_method_html:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

:ref:`Color<class_Color>` **html**\ (\ rgba\: :ref:`String<class_String>`\ ) |static| :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_Color_method_html>`

ä» HTML åå…­è¿›åˆ¶é¢œè‰²å­—ç¬¦ä¸² ``rgba`` è¿”å›ä¸€ä¸ªæ–°é¢œè‰²ã€‚\ ``rgba`` ä¸åŒºåˆ†å¤§å°å†™ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨å“ˆå¸Œç¬¦å·ï¼ˆ\ ``#``\ ï¼‰ä½œä¸ºå‰ç¼€ã€‚

\ ``rgba`` å¿…é¡»æ˜¯æœ‰æ•ˆçš„ä¸‰ä½æˆ–å…­ä½åå…­è¿›åˆ¶é¢œè‰²å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”å¯ä»¥åŒ…å« alpha é€šé“å€¼ã€‚å¦‚æœ ``rgba`` ä¸åŒ…å« alpha é€šé“å€¼ï¼Œåˆ™åº”ç”¨ alpha é€šé“å€¼ 1.0ã€‚å¦‚æœ ``rgba`` æ— æ•ˆï¼Œåˆ™è¿”å›ä¸€ä¸ªç©ºé¢œè‰²ã€‚


.. tabs::

 .. code-tab:: gdscript

    var blue = Color.html("#0000ff") # blue ä¸º Color(0.0, 0.0, 1.0, 1.0)
    var green = Color.html("#0F0")   # green ä¸º Color(0.0, 1.0, 0.0, 1.0)
    var col = Color.html("663399cc") # col ä¸º Color(0.4, 0.2, 0.6, 0.8)

 .. code-tab:: csharp

    var blue = Color.FromHtml("#0000ff"); // blue ä¸º Color(0.0, 0.0, 1.0, 1.0)
    var green = Color.FromHtml("#0F0");   // green ä¸º Color(0.0, 1.0, 0.0, 1.0)
    var col = Color.FromHtml("663399cc"); // col ä¸º Color(0.4, 0.2, 0.6, 0.8)



.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

----

.. _class_Color_method_html_is_valid:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

:ref:`bool<class_bool>` **html_is_valid**\ (\ color\: :ref:`String<class_String>`\ ) |static| :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_Color_method_html_is_valid>`

å¦‚æœ ``color`` æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªæœ‰æ•ˆçš„ HTML åå…­è¿›åˆ¶é¢œè‰²å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ï¼Œåˆ™è¿”å› ``true``\ ã€‚è¯¥å­—ç¬¦ä¸²å¿…é¡»æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªç”± 3ã€4ã€6 æˆ– 8 ä½æ•°å­—ç»„æˆçš„åå…­è¿›åˆ¶å€¼ï¼ˆä¸åŒºåˆ†å¤§å°å†™ï¼‰ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”å¯ä»¥ä»¥äº•å· (``#``) ä½œä¸ºå‰ç¼€ã€‚è¯¥æ–¹æ³•ä¸ :ref:`String.is_valid_html_color<class_String_method_is_valid_html_color>` ç›¸åŒã€‚


.. tabs::

 .. code-tab:: gdscript

    Color.html_is_valid("#55aaFF")   # è¿”å› true
    Color.html_is_valid("#55AAFF20") # è¿”å› true
    Color.html_is_valid("55AAFF")    # è¿”å› true
    Color.html_is_valid("#F2C")      # è¿”å› true
    
    Color.html_is_valid("#AABBC")     # è¿”å› false
    Color.html_is_valid("#55aaFF5")  # è¿”å› false

 .. code-tab:: csharp

    Color.HtmlIsValid("#55AAFF");   // è¿”å› true
    Color.HtmlIsValid("#55AAFF20"); // è¿”å› true
    Color.HtmlIsValid("55AAFF");    // è¿”å› true
    Color.HtmlIsValid("#F2C");      // è¿”å› true
    
    Color.HtmlIsValid("#AABBC");    // è¿”å› false
    Color.HtmlIsValid("#55aaFF5");  // è¿”å› false



.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

.. _class_Color_method_inverted:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

:ref:`Color<class_Color>` **inverted**\ (\ ) |const| :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_Color_method_inverted>`

è¿”å›å°† :ref:`r<class_Color_property_r>`\ ã€\ :ref:`g<class_Color_property_g>`\ ã€\ :ref:`b<class_Color_property_b>` åˆ†é‡ç¿»è½¬åçš„é¢œè‰²ï¼ˆ\ ``(1 - r, 1 - g, 1 - b, a)``\ ï¼‰ã€‚


.. tabs::

 .. code-tab:: gdscript

    var black = Color.WHITE.inverted()
    var color = Color(0.3, 0.4, 0.9)
    var inverted_color = color.inverted() # ç­‰ä»·äº `Color(0.7, 0.6, 0.1)`

 .. code-tab:: csharp

    var black = Colors.White.Inverted();
    var color = new Color(0.3f, 0.4f, 0.9f);
    Color invertedColor = color.Inverted(); // ç­‰ä»·äº `new Color(0.7f, 0.6f, 0.1f)`

.. rst-class:: classref-method

:ref:`bool<class_bool>` **is_equal_approx**\ (\ to\: :ref:`Color<class_Color>`\ ) |const| :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_Color_method_is_equal_approx>`

å¦‚æœè¯¥é¢œè‰²å’Œ ``to`` è¿‘ä¼¼ç›¸ç­‰ï¼Œåˆ™è¿”å› ``true``\ ï¼Œåˆ¤æ–­è¿‘ä¼¼ç›¸ç­‰çš„æ–¹æ³•æ˜¯é€šè¿‡åœ¨æ¯ä¸ªåˆ†é‡ä¸Šè¿è¡Œ :ref:`@GlobalScope.is_equal_approx<class_@GlobalScope_method_is_equal_approx>`\ ã€‚

.. _class_Color_method_lerp:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

:ref:`Color<class_Color>` **lerp**\ (\ to\: :ref:`Color<class_Color>`, weight\: :ref:`float<class_float>`\ ) |const| :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_Color_method_lerp>`

è¿”å›å°†è¯¥é¢œè‰²çš„åˆ†é‡å’Œ ``to`` çš„åˆ†é‡è¿›è¡Œçº¿æ€§æ’å€¼çš„ç»“æœã€‚æ’å€¼ç³»æ•° ``weight`` åº”è¯¥åœ¨ 0.0 å’Œ 1.0 ä¹‹é—´ï¼ˆé—­åŒºé—´ï¼‰ã€‚å¦è¯·å‚é˜… :ref:`@GlobalScope.lerp<class_@GlobalScope_method_lerp>`\ ã€‚


.. tabs::

 .. code-tab:: gdscript

    var red = Color(1.0, 0.0, 0.0)
    var aqua = Color(0.0, 1.0, 0.8)
    
    red.lerp(aqua, 0.2) # è¿”å› Color(0.8, 0.2, 0.16)
    red.lerp(aqua, 0.5) # è¿”å› Color(0.5, 0.5, 0.4)
    red.lerp(aqua, 1.0) # è¿”å› Color(0.0, 1.0, 0.8)

 .. code-tab:: csharp

    var red = new Color(1.0f, 0.0f, 0.0f);
    var aqua = new Color(0.0f, 1.0f, 0.8f);
    
    red.Lerp(aqua, 0.2f); // è¿”å› Color(0.8f, 0.2f, 0.16f)
    red.Lerp(aqua, 0.5f); // è¿”å› Color(0.5f, 0.5f, 0.4f)
    red.Lerp(aqua, 1.0f); // è¿”å› Color(0.0f, 1.0f, 0.8f)



.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

----

.. _class_Color_method_lightened:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

:ref:`Color<class_Color>` **lightened**\ (\ amount\: :ref:`float<class_float>`\ ) |const| :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_Color_method_lightened>`

è¿”å›é€šè¿‡æŒ‡å®š ``amount``\ ï¼ˆä» 0.0 åˆ° 1.0 çš„æ¯”ç‡ï¼‰ä½¿è¯¥é¢œè‰²å˜äº®è€Œäº§ç”Ÿçš„æ–°é¢œè‰²ã€‚å¦è§ :ref:`darkened<class_Color_method_darkened>`\ ã€‚


.. tabs::

 .. code-tab:: gdscript

    var green = Color(0.0, 1.0, 0.0)
    var light_green = green.lightened(0.2) # æ¯”æ™®é€šçš„ç»¿è‰²è¦æ·¡ 20%

 .. code-tab:: csharp

    var green = new Color(0.0f, 1.0f, 0.0f);
    Color lightGreen = green.Lightened(0.2f); // æ¯”æ™®é€šçš„ç»¿è‰²è¦æ·¡ 20%

è¿”å›è½¬æ¢åˆ° `sRGB <https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SRGB>`__ è‰²å½©ç©ºé—´çš„é¢œè‰²ã€‚è¯¥æ–¹æ³•å‡å®šåŸå§‹é¢œè‰²ä½äºçº¿æ€§è‰²å½©ç©ºé—´ä¸­ã€‚å¦è¯·å‚é˜…æ‰§è¡Œç›¸åæ“ä½œçš„ :ref:`srgb_to_linear<class_Color_method_srgb_to_linear>`\ ã€‚

è¿”å›è½¬æ¢åˆ°çº¿æ€§è‰²å½©ç©ºé—´çš„é¢œè‰²ã€‚è¯¥æ–¹æ³•å‡å®šåŸå§‹é¢œè‰²å·²ç»åœ¨ sRGB è‰²å½©ç©ºé—´ä¸­ã€‚å¦è¯·å‚è§æ‰§è¡Œç›¸åæ“ä½œçš„ :ref:`linear_to_srgb<class_Color_method_linear_to_srgb>`\ ã€‚

.. _class_Color_method_to_abgr32:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

:ref:`int<class_int>` **to_abgr32**\ (\ ) |const| :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_Color_method_to_abgr32>`

è¿”å›è½¬æ¢ä¸º ABGR æ ¼å¼ï¼ˆæ¯ä¸ªåˆ†é‡ä¸º 8 ä½ï¼‰çš„ 32 ä½æ•´æ•°çš„é¢œè‰²ã€‚ABGR æ˜¯é»˜è®¤ RGBA æ ¼å¼çš„åè½¬ç‰ˆæœ¬ã€‚


.. tabs::

 .. code-tab:: gdscript

    var color = Color(1, 0.5, 0.2)
    print(color.to_abgr32()) # è¾“å‡º 4281565439

 .. code-tab:: csharp

    var color = new Color(1.0f, 0.5f, 0.2f);
    GD.Print(color.ToAbgr32()); // è¾“å‡º 4281565439



.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

----

.. _class_Color_method_to_abgr64:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

:ref:`int<class_int>` **to_abgr64**\ (\ ) |const| :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_Color_method_to_abgr64>`

è¿”å›è½¬æ¢ä¸º ABGR æ ¼å¼ï¼ˆæ¯ä¸ªåˆ†é‡ä¸º 16 ä½ï¼‰çš„ 64 ä½æ•´æ•°çš„é¢œè‰²ã€‚ABGR æ˜¯é»˜è®¤ RGBA æ ¼å¼çš„åè½¬ç‰ˆæœ¬ã€‚


.. tabs::

 .. code-tab:: gdscript

    var color = Color(1, 0.5, 0.2)
    print(color.to_abgr64()) # è¾“å‡º -225178692812801

 .. code-tab:: csharp

    var color = new Color(1.0f, 0.5f, 0.2f);
    GD.Print(color.ToAbgr64()); // è¾“å‡º -225178692812801

:ref:`int<class_int>` **to_argb32**\ (\ ) |const| :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_Color_method_to_argb32>`

è¿”å›è½¬æ¢ä¸º ARGB æ ¼å¼ï¼ˆæ¯ä¸ªåˆ†é‡ä¸º 8 ä½ï¼‰çš„ 32 ä½æ•´æ•°çš„é¢œè‰²ã€‚ARGB ä¸ DirectX æ›´å…¼å®¹ã€‚

    var color = Color(1, 0.5, 0.2)
    print(color.to_argb32()) # è¾“å‡º 4294934323

 .. code-tab:: csharp

    var color = new Color(1.0f, 0.5f, 0.2f);
    GD.Print(color.ToArgb32()); // è¾“å‡º 4294934323

è¿”å›è½¬æ¢ä¸º ARGB æ ¼å¼ï¼ˆæ¯ä¸ªåˆ†é‡ä¸º 16 ä½ï¼‰çš„ 64 ä½æ•´æ•°çš„é¢œè‰²ã€‚ARGB ä¸ DirectX æ›´å…¼å®¹ã€‚

    GD.Print(color.ToArgb64()); // è¾“å‡º -2147470541

.. _class_Color_method_to_html:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

:ref:`String<class_String>` **to_html**\ (\ with_alpha\: :ref:`bool<class_bool>` = true\ ) |const| :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_Color_method_to_html>`

è¿”å›å°†è¯¥é¢œè‰²è½¬æ¢ä¸º RGBA æ ¼å¼çš„ HTML åå…­è¿›åˆ¶é¢œè‰² :ref:`String<class_String>`\ ï¼Œä¸å¸¦ï¼ˆ\ ``#``\ ï¼‰å‰ç¼€ã€‚

å°† ``with_alpha`` è®¾ç½®ä¸º ``false``\ ï¼Œä¼šä»åå…­è¿›åˆ¶å­—ç¬¦ä¸²ä¸­æ’é™¤ alphaï¼Œä½¿ç”¨ RGB æ ¼å¼è€Œä¸æ˜¯ RGBA æ ¼å¼ã€‚


.. tabs::

 .. code-tab:: gdscript

    var white = Color(1, 1, 1, 0.5)
    var with_alpha = white.to_html() # è¿”å› "ffffff7f"
    var without_alpha = white.to_html(false) # è¿”å› "ffffff"

 .. code-tab:: csharp

    var white = new Color(1, 1, 1, 0.5f);
    string withAlpha = white.ToHtml(); // è¿”å› "ffffff7f"
    string withoutAlpha = white.ToHtml(false); // è¿”å› "ffffff"



.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

----

.. _class_Color_method_to_rgba32:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

:ref:`int<class_int>` **to_rgba32**\ (\ ) |const| :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_Color_method_to_rgba32>`

Returns the color converted to a 32-bit integer in RGBA format (each component is 8 bits). RGBA is Godot's default format. This method is the inverse of :ref:`hex<class_Color_method_hex>`.


.. tabs::

 .. code-tab:: gdscript

    var color = Color(1, 0.5, 0.2)
    print(color.to_rgba32()) # Prints 4286526463

 .. code-tab:: csharp

    var color = new Color(1, 0.5f, 0.2f);
    GD.Print(color.ToRgba32()); // Prints 4286526463



.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

----

.. _class_Color_method_to_rgba64:

.. rst-class:: classref-method

:ref:`int<class_int>` **to_rgba64**\ (\ ) |const| :ref:`ğŸ”—<class_Color_method_to_rgba64>`

Returns the color converted to a 64-bit integer in RGBA format (each component is 16 bits). RGBA is Godot's default format. This method is the inverse of :ref:`hex64<class_Color_method_hex64>`.


.. tabs::

 .. code-tab:: gdscript

    var color = Color(1, 0.5, 0.2)
    print(color.to_rgba64()) # Prints -140736629309441

 .. code-tab:: csharp

    var color = new Color(1, 0.5f, 0.2f);
    GD.Print(color.ToRgba64()); // Prints -140736629309441



.. rst-class:: classref-section-separator

----

.. rst-class:: classref-descriptions-group

è¿ç®—ç¬¦è¯´æ˜

\ **æ³¨æ„ï¼š**\ ç”±äºæµ®ç‚¹æ•°ç²¾åº¦è¯¯å·®ï¼Œè¯·è€ƒè™‘æ”¹ç”¨ :ref:`is_equal_approx<class_Color_method_is_equal_approx>`\ ï¼Œä¼šæ›´å¯é ã€‚

.. rst-class:: classref-item-separator

----

.. _class_Color_operator_dif_Color:

.. rst-class:: classref-operator
